contest-event.event-date:
March 27, 1976 D SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Juvenile Section)
SWBBA Spring Brass Band Festival (Juvenile Section) 100 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) South West BBA Spring Brass Band Festival swbba-spring-brass-band-festival-juvenile-section
Queen's Theatre, Barnstaple, Devon, England, UK Test piece awards: 1st: Wessex Youth Cup and £6 music voucher 2nd: Mary Drew Cup and £3 music voucher 3rd: Conibear Cup
Own choice march contest also held: 1st: Bideford Juniors (180pts) 2nd: South Molton Juniors (177pts)
April 9, 2012, 6:28 p.m. April 9, 2012, 6:35 p.m.
1 South Molton Junior Ray Jones
2 Bideford Town Youth M. W. Sweet
3 Okehampton Junior Reg Beardon
Unknown Result Bodmin Town Youth C. J. Bunt
Unknown Result Mole Valley Silver O. Taylor
Unknown Result Hatherleigh Juniors J. M. C. Nairn
Unknown Result Liskeard Juniors D. Howlett
Unknown Result Totnes Juniors K. Peters
Withdrawn Northlew and Ashbury P. O. Adams
